SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DataProcessor
Handles the loading and saving of movie data to and from a JSON file.
ErrorView
A view class responsible for displaying error messages to the user. .
Main
 
MainController
Controller for managing the flow of data in the movie manager application and updating the view in response to user interactions.
MainView
The main user interface class for interacting with users in the movie manager application.
Movie
Represents a movie properties within the movie manager application.
MovieList
Represents a collection of movies.
MoviesService
Service class for managing movies.
StatisticsResult
Encapsulates the results of various statistical analyses of the user movies.
StatisticsService
Provides statistical analysis services for a movies.
StatisticsView
Handles the display of statistical data related to movies.
Statuses
Enumerates the possible statuses for a user's added movie.
